page.title: 09TRADES_SMALL BUSINESSES
page.content: Although mainly a rural area there are many varied trades in our squares like Direct Windows in Acaster Malbis. They put the glass in special machines to check if it has any scratches then they fit the frames and fill them with U.P.V.C There is Tony Sedmam's DIY merchants in Copmanthorpe selling building materials. Mr Sedman also sells rabbits and logs and firewood. He also has a joinery business where he fits windows and doors. Also there are the Marinas in Acaster Malbis and Naburn where they mend and make boats and paint and sell them.Boat owners have to pay so much money to keep the boats there. There is a sawmill in Acaster Malbis where they make fences out of wood which they saw with large saws,they also sell logs for fires.
